title: Karger Publishers launches AI Innovation Hub to drive advancement in global health
description: The AI Innovation Hub is designed for innovators, researchers, and AI developers who want to co-create solutions that enhance progress in health sciences and biomedical research.

title: New AI Weather Tool Outperforms Global Forecasting Centers
description: Microsoft has developed an artificial intelligence (AI) model that beats current forecasting methods in tracking air quality, weather patterns, and climate-addled tropical storms, according to findings published Wednesday.

title: How artificial intelligence could transform the banking industry
description: AI agents will initially work alongside bankers to help with everyday tasks and help to prepare for client meetings.

description: Speed versus depth

title: In Taiwan and China, young people turn to AI chatbots for ‘cheaper, easier’ therapy
description: Experts say there is huge potential for AI in the mental health sector, but there are risks of turning to technology, rather than human beings when in distress

title: ‘Protect Bathurst’ use AI videos to fight proposed bus lanes
description: Videos using artificial-intelligence were found on the campaign’s Instagram page, warning about negative effects of the bus-only lanes.

title: I tried Google's new AI try-on feature, and it's given me some new fashion ideas
description: But I'll still need to try clothes on in real life

title: At Google I/O, Sergey Brin makes surprise appearance - and declares Google will build the first AGI
description: Google co-founder Sergey Brin makes surprise appearance at Google I/O, declaring "Gemini will be the very first AGI," revealing philosophical tensions with DeepMind CEO Hassabis who urges scientific caution in the high-stakes AI race.

title: Are Character AI’s chatbots protected speech? One court isn’t sure

title: Days after Ola Krutrim employee found dead in Bengaluru, social media post hints at ‘work pressure’
description: Nikhil Somwanshi, a 25-year-old machine learning engineer at Ola Krutrim, was found dead on May 8. He allegedly died by suicide.

title: Your Voice Could Hide The Tell-Tale Signs of Parkinson's Disease
description: In a continued effort to catch neurodegenerative diseases early, researchers directed machine learning models to see if they could 'hear' Parkinson's disease in patients' voices.

title: AI takes lead in farm finance: Machine learning beats legacy models in bankruptcy prediction
description: While both models showed remarkable prediction accuracy, decision trees offered an added advantage: interpretability. Decision trees allow for clear threshold identification, rule-based decision paths, and easier communication of financial risks to non-technical stakeholders—an area where ANN models fall short due to their “black-box” nature.

title: IIT-Madras, Emeritus launch certification programme in Applied Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
description: The programme will provide more than 25 tools and libraries, including TensorFlow, Keras, Scikit-Learn and the latest Gen AI models such as Mistral. It will also offer 30+ projects and cases as well as the latest research papers for real-world case studies and in-depth insights.

title: Why self-driving technology is already outperforming the average driver

title: AI is giving a boost to efforts to monitor health via radar
description: Today’s radar technology can detect the minute movements when your heart beats or you take a breath. Machine learning turns those signals into vital signs readings.

title: How machine learning can spark many discoveries in science and medicine
description: Scientists are turning to machine learning to predict diseases, design drugs, and uncover hidden patterns in massive datasets, signalling a new era of discovery.

title: How AI can cut costs and boost resilience in microgrids?
description: Hybrid AI approaches, combining techniques like deep learning with evolutionary algorithms, can create more robust and adaptable EMS. These systems would dynamically balance trade-offs between energy cost, reliability, and sustainability, providing tailored solutions for diverse microgrid architectures.

title: AI tool uses facial images to predict biological age and cancer survival
description: Eyes may be the window to the soul, but a person's biological age could be reflected in their facial characteristics. Investigators from Mass General Brigham developed a deep learning algorithm called FaceAge that uses a photo of a person's face to predict biological age and survival outcomes for patients with cancer.

title: Deep learning model enhances Alzheimer’s screening amid aging crisis

title: Cyberpunk 2077 on the Nintendo Switch 2 will offer Nvidia's DLSS tech
description: CD Projekt Red has confirmed that the Nintendo Switch 2 version of Cyberpunk 2077 will feature Nvidia DLSS (Deep Learning Super Sampling).

title: AI-powered ensemble model sets new benchmark for tea crop health monitoring
description: Traditional disease detection methods in agriculture often rely on manual observation by specialists, a process that is labor-intensive, error-prone, and impractical for large-scale farms. The new study tackles this issue by automating disease recognition using advanced deep learning techniques, including transfer learning and ensemble learning.

title: AI boosts liver cancer detection by highlighting doubtful areas
description: A new editorial was published in Oncotarget, Volume 16, on April 4, 2025, titled "Deep learning-based uncertainty quantification for quality assurance in hepatobiliary imaging-based techniques."

title: Using Deep Learning for Brain Imaging Data Analysis
description: The integration of deep learning in neuroimaging enhances diagnostic capabilities, offering new insights into neurological disorders and treatment responses.

title: AI model achieves high accuracy in detecting odontogenic sinusitis in dental X-rays
description: The Ateneo Laboratory for Intelligent Visual Environments (ALIVE) and international researchers have developed a deep learning model that aims to revolutionize dentistry, with the capability to identify tooth and sinus structures in dental X-rays with an accuracy of 98.2%.

title: This spacecraft swarm could spot interstellar visitors zipping through our solar system
description: Hiroyasu Tsukamota has developed a deep-learning-based guidance and control framework called Neural-Rendezvous that could allow spacecraft to safely encounter interstellar objects.

title: AI predicts chronic disease patterns using electronic health records
description: AI tools are transforming EHR datasets into actionable clinical insights by identifying disease patterns, predicting comorbidities, and stratifying patient risk. The reviewed studies predominantly used clustering techniques, XGBoost, random forest, and neural networks to uncover multimorbidity networks and forecast disease trajectories.

title: How does your brain create new memories? Neuroscientists discover ‘rules’ for how neurons encode new information

title: Redefining human-centered design: AI and EEG for emotion-sensitive architecture
description: The AI model employs a hybrid deep learning approach combining convolutional neural networks (CNNs) and long short-term memory (LSTM) architectures. CNNs extract spatial features from EEG data, while LSTMs capture temporal dependencies, enabling precise emotion classification.

title: New LLM optimization technique slashes memory costs up to 75%
